name: vue-example
description: The canonical use case for jQuery has historically been submitting a form with an AJAX call, so we should take a look at that as well. Vue actually does not have a built-in thing like AJAX; itâ€™s typical in Vue application to use something like Axios (a JavaScript library for making HTTP requests) to help with this task.
author: Filippo Nardi & Edoardo Gargano
